mapper.select: SELECT /* selectAddress by MainController addRedirect Method */ CITY_SEQ AS citySeq, CITY_FIRST_SECTION AS cityFirstSection, CITY_SECOND_SECTION AS citySecondSection, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, INSERT_USER AS insertUser, CITY_CODE AS cityCode FROM CITYTBL
mapper.insert: INSERT /* insertUser by MainController addprocess Method */ INTO USERTBL (USER_SEQ, DELETE_YN, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_AGE, USER_ADDR, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER) VALUES (NULL, DEFAULT, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userAge}, #{userAddr}, NOW(), DEFAULT)
